code: var formatType=function formatType(type){var color;switch(type){case"Normal":color="pink lighten-1";break;case"Fee":color="green lighten-1";break;case"Feu":color="red";break;case"Eau":color="blue lighten-1";break;case"Poison":color="lime accent-4";break;case"Vol":color="deep orange";break;case"Electrique":color="yellow accent-2";break;case"Combat":color="brown accent-3";break;default:color="grey";break;}return"chip ".concat(color);};export default formatType;
